name: Parabox (Ludum Dare 26)
description:
This game was made during April 26-29th, 2013 for Ludum Dare 26. It took just under 72 hours to complete and was made in the Blender Game Engine.

Visit the Ludum Dare page here: http://bit.ly/19e01c5

WASD/Arrow keys to navigate
Spacebar to jump
The rest you'll have to figure out for yourself. ;)

If you are not running Windows, make sure to pay attention to the download & install instructions.
